titleStmt.title: The soules immortall crowne consisting of seauen glorious graces I. Vertue. 2. Wisedome. 3. Loue. 4. Constancie. 5. Patience. 6. Humilitie. 7. Infinitenes. : devided into seaven dayes workes, and dedicated to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Lownes, and are to be sold by I.C. and F.B.,

notesStmt.note: Title and text within ornamental border.
Signatures E2 and E3 mislabeled in reverse order.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
